#include <iostream>

using namespace std;

#define LL long long
#define ULL unsigned long long

#define si(n) scanf("%d",&n)

#define FOR(i,a,b) for(int i=(a);i<(b);i++)

LL cnt;

#define gc getchar_unlocked
 
void scanint(int &x)
{
    register int c = gc();
    x = 0;
    int neg = 0;
    for(;((c<48 || c>57) && c != '-');c = gc());
    if(c=='-') {neg=1;c=gc();}
    for(;c>47 && c<58;c = gc()) {x = (x<<1) + (x<<3) + c - 48;}
    if(neg) x=-x;
}

void merge(int x[],int l,int m,int r)
{
	int size=r-l+1;
	int tmp[size];
	int left_end=l;
	int right_end=m+1;
	int j=0;
	while(left_end<=m&&right_end<=r)
	{
		if(x[left_end]<=x[right_end])
		{
			tmp[j++]=x[left_end];
			left_end++;
		}
		
		else
		{
			cnt+=m-left_end+1;
			tmp[j++]=x[right_end];
			right_end++;
		}
	}
	FOR(i,left_end,m+1)
	{
		tmp[j++]=x[i];
	}
	FOR(i,right_end,r+1)
	{
		tmp[j++]=x[i];
	}
	FOR(i,0,j)
	{
		x[l+i]=tmp[i];
	}
}
void mergesort(int x[],int l,int r)
{
	if(l<r)
	{
		int m=(l+r)/2;
		mergesort(x,l,m);
		mergesort(x,m+1,r);
		merge(x,l,m,r);
	}
}
int main()
{
   int t;
   scanint(t);
   while(t--)
   {
	   int n;
	   scanint(n);
	   int b[n+1];
	   int a[n+1];
	   int tmp;
	   
	   FOR(i,0,n)
	   {
		   scanint(a[i]);
		   b[a[i]]=i+1;
	   }
	   
	   cnt=0;
	   
	   FOR(i,0,n)
	   {
		scanint(tmp);
		a[i]=b[tmp];
	   }
	   
	   mergesort(a,0,n-1);
	   
	   printf("%lld\n",cnt);
   }
   return 0;
}
